   "source": [
    "import os, sys\n",
    "# hack to allow scripts to be placed in subdirectories next to pyAp:\n",
    "if not os.path.exists('pyAp') and os.path.exists('../pyAp'):\n",
    "    sys.path.insert(1, os.path.abspath('..'))\n",
    "from pathlib import Path\n",
    "import math, random, pandas as pd, numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt, seaborn as sns\n",
    "import warnings    "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import pyAp.ApSatTemp as calc_AST"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Inputs are SiO<sub>2</sub> (wt%) concentration in the melt, and P<sub>2</sub>O<sub>5</sub> (wt%) concentration in the melt "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "When wrong input values are used. For example, one uses concetration (conc) in the incorrect mass fraction (0<conc<1) rather than the correct weight percent (1<conc<100)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      ">> Concentrations are expressed as mass fractions. Multiply them by 100 to convert into percentage!\n"
     ]
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "nan"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "calc_AST.AST(0.55,0.003)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "When correct input values are used"
   ]
